latest_videos.video_title: Silly Spooky Song üéÉ Learn to Read with A and T | BAT, CAT, HAT | @officialalphablocks
latest_videos.video_description:
Get ready for a fun, spooky adventure with the Alphablocks! Join your favourite letters as they dress up in Halloween costumes and sing a silly, spooky song. This song is perfect for helping toddlers and preschoolers learn the sounds of letters A, T, C, B, and H and see how they blend together to make simple words.

Perfect for co-viewing with your little one to build confidence in reading!

üìö LEARNING FOCUS IN THIS SONG:
Phonics: Letter sounds for A, T, C, B, H
Blending: Creating CVC (Consonant-Vowel-Consonant) words.
Word Families: The "at" family.
Vocabulary: bat, cat, hat, boo

‚è∞ TIMESTAMPS / CHAPTERS:
00:00 - Intro: A Spooky Night!
00:08 - Meet Alphablock A and T
00:20 - Let's Make AT!
00:45 - Meet Alphablock B
01:05 - Let's Make BAT!
01:25 - Meet Alphablock C
01:40 - Let's Make CAT!
02:05 - Meet Alphablock H
02:20 - Let's Make HAT!
02:45 - It's time to sing the full Spooky Song!

popular_videos.video_title: Silly Spooky Song üéÉ Learn to Read with A and T | BAT, CAT, HAT | @officialalphablocks
popular_videos.video_description:
Get ready for a fun, spooky adventure with the Alphablocks! Join your favourite letters as they dress up in Halloween costumes and sing a silly, spooky song. This song is perfect for helping toddlers and preschoolers learn the sounds of letters A, T, C, B, and H and see how they blend together to make simple words.

Perfect for co-viewing with your little one to build confidence in reading!

üìö LEARNING FOCUS IN THIS SONG:
Phonics: Letter sounds for A, T, C, B, H
Blending: Creating CVC (Consonant-Vowel-Consonant) words.
Word Families: The "at" family.
Vocabulary: bat, cat, hat, boo

‚è∞ TIMESTAMPS / CHAPTERS:
00:00 - Intro: A Spooky Night!
00:08 - Meet Alphablock A and T
00:20 - Let's Make AT!
00:45 - Meet Alphablock B
01:05 - Let's Make BAT!
01:25 - Meet Alphablock C
01:40 - Let's Make CAT!
02:05 - Meet Alphablock H
02:20 - Let's Make HAT!
02:45 - It's time to sing the full Spooky Song!

What if the alphabet came to life?

Who better to show you how words work than the letters of the alphabet themselves? Alphablocks is the hit CBeebies TV show that‚Äôs helped millions of children learn to read through adventures, songs and laughter. It‚Äôs a ton of fun with letters and words ‚Äì all built on a firm foundation of key phonics skills.

BAFTA-nominated Alphablocks helps children to learn to read - mastering phonics, blending and reading skills with each new episode! It‚Äôs a story of 26 friends who have fun making word magic.

Every episode has been carefully crafted with the help of literacy experts to ensure a best-practice approach to phonics ‚àí and lovingly brought to life by multi-award-winning Blue Zoo Animation Studio. Get ready for an animated adventure that can take your child all the way from their ABCs to reading with confidence.

Alphablocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential phonics skills. More than 80 episodes take them from learning their alphabet to reading long words like 'alphabet'!

recommended_videos.title: Silly Spooky Song üéÉ Learn to Read with A and T | BAT, CAT, HAT | @officialalphablocks
recommended_videos.description:
Get ready for a fun, spooky adventure with the Alphablocks! Join your favourite letters as they dress up in Halloween costumes and sing a silly, spooky song. This song is perfect for helping toddlers and preschoolers learn the sounds of letters A, T, C, B, and H and see how they blend together to make simple words.

Perfect for co-viewing with your little one to build confidence in reading!

üìö LEARNING FOCUS IN THIS SONG:
Phonics: Letter sounds for A, T, C, B, H
Blending: Creating CVC (Consonant-Vowel-Consonant) words.
Word Families: The "at" family.
Vocabulary: bat, cat, hat, boo

01:25 - Meet Alphablock C
